name: Cards Against Sanctity
description:
Have You ever wanted to play cards with the devil itself? Now You can! You will play a well known card game in the underground: Cards Against Sanctity. Who doesn’t like gambling? Oh, did I mention that instead of boring money, You will be playing for the years of your life?

How to play:

First choose how much You want to bet by pressing LMB on coins in the bottom part of screen. The number below this coins shows amount of coins You have. 

                                                             

Number of coins in the middle shows the bet size.

When You’re done with bets press LMB on this emblem to start a game.

                                       

In this game there are 4 types of cards (which are shown on emblem) and each card has its own power value. The goal of the game is to have more card points on the table than the opponent. You can view your cards power by simply putting your mouse over one of your cards. To pick up a card press and hold LMB then drag to your desired place. The places where You can put your card will green sides as shown on the picture below.

                                                     

You are always able to put your cards on any of your side of the table, but You can also destroy your opponents cards (your card will also get destroyed). But to destroy your opponent cards, your card needs to be specific Type (Fire card can destroy ice cards, ice can destroy water and water can destroy fire). There is also a fourth type of card: Ground type. Ground cards cannot destroy any other cards and can be destroyed by all the rest of types, but they work as shields: To be able to destroy fire, ice or water cards, all shields must be destroyed first. All of that is shown on the emblem.

                                         

In your turn You have 2 moves. When You want to end your turn simply press LMB on the emblem. In the each bet there are 4 turns (2 are yours and 2 are AI turns), after 4 turns bet ends and bet is won by player who have more power points (The amount of your points is shown above your placed cards). After that You are back to placing bets.

I know that rules might be a bit complicated, but I hope You’ll still enjoy it. Have fun!
